data.message:
Please  do something about this!  Why won't Facebook take this page down?  Many of us have reported this page and Facebook says it doesn't violate their policy.  This is clearly animal abuse!    
https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=284056811763481&ref=br_tf

replies.message: Just because it's illegal in your country doesn't mean it's not an important part of another culture.  If it offends you so much then just grow up and stop looking at it.
Because Corey Berger ... Facebook clearly states in their policy that animal abuse will not be tolerated.  And if you think this is ok, you need to get your head examined!
I don't feel like it's my place to tell others what they can and can't do.
